name: Embrace The Fear
developer: 世纪龙信息网络有限责任公司
publisher: 世纪龙信息网络有限责任公司
description: "Embrace The Fear" is a first-person perspective of the chamber to escape the game. Players in an abandoned house, cold floors, old furniture, swaying lights, in this environment players need to collect in each room to decrypt the clues, crack the puzzle can open a Road room door, the final escape from the house.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 4440 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better, Video Output: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires tracked motion controllers for input
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 4440 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better, Video Output: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 800 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires tracked motion controllers for input
